about_the_game:
Farzin has fallen, now you must embark on this journey towards Omnipotence to undo this misfortune!


Farzin, an isolated city surrounded by a dense dark forest, has always resisted the creatures that attacked it. But this time after eons of resistance, the city fell.
One of its citizens still believes that it is possible to reverse this catastrophe and while the city burns, Mikene put on her armor and picked up her sword, ready to embark on a journey of faith to acquire a power that until then only exists in fables and ancient books.



Each Aspect of Balance will grant a different set of abilities to Mikene, unlocking them all will unlock her full potential and give she the unique opportunity to become an Omnipotent. Do not fail, defeat is permanent and the city of Farzin depends on your success.


Having said all that, your mission will not be easy, Mikene will have to face hundreds of hordes of enemies and they will be merciless, each of them has a special way of killing you! There will be no mercy or clemency on their part, they know your intentions and they know that you want to be Omnipotent. They are willing to sacrifice their lives in an attempt to stop you.


Be prepared to face countless special enemies on your way, you will have to come up with strategies if you want to win as they are willing to do anything to stop your journey towards Omnipotence. After eons Farzin has finally fallen, and they will not allow a single person to reverse it.

Features

  • Many different combinations to face all enemies!
  • Unleash over 25 different spells as Mikene acquires new Aspects of Balance
  • Each enemy has its own behavior, attacks and resistances.
  • Online Score
  • Over 100 different items to equip/use
  • 8 different biomes to explore and conquer

short_description: Guide Mikene in the search for the 7 Aspects of Balance to achieve Omnipotence and put an end to the problem plaguing the city of Farzin once and for all. Dive into hordes of enemies in this frantic hack n' slash in the best Soulslike style!
